ai-patthana23.40:0.2_0: under the investigation of principles means to the extent of the Dhamma.
ai-patthana23.40:0.3_0: for one who gets close to the feelings,
ai-patthana23.40:1.1_0: One should not give rise to the enjoyment of feeling in regard to it as pleasant feeling,
ai-patthana23.40:1.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana23.40:2.1_0: One should not give rise to repulsion with pain for the associated with painful feeling. Neither with painful feeling, without a cause or reason.
ai-patthana23.40:2.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana23.40:3.1_0: Not for the sake of the neither-painful-nor-pleasant feeling, nor by impingement and shameless feeling arises dependent on a basis, conditioned by repulsion.
ai-patthana23.40:3.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
